DOC.brief_summary: There breast cancer support group focus specific need Chinese woman . The purpose study learn two different way provide support group help woman Chinese descent cope difficulty diagnosis breast cancer treatment . The investigator want learn best support Chinese woman breast cancer provide two different type group : in-person support group virtual ( online/phone ) support group .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Culturally-Tailored Information-Based Support Groups Chinese Immigrants With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Female NonUS bear Resident US < 20 year Of Chinese descent Age 21 year 80 year Language speak : Mandarin Diagnosis breast cancer within 3 month prior recruitment *Not require breast cancer patient ' first and/or cancer diagnosis Currently receive cancer treatment ; Will live continuously US next year Has telephone he/she willing use study Presence cognitive impairment disorder ( i.e. , delirium dementia ) sufficient preclude meaningful inform consent and/or data collection Another household member already enrol . Prior participation cancer support group
